precipitate.translation[0].definitions[0: to make something serious happen suddenly or more quickly than was expected
The riot was precipitated when four black men were arrested.
precipitate.translation[0].definitions[1: to separate a solid substance from a liquid by chemical action, or to be separated in this way
precipitate.translation[1].definitions[0: a solid substance that has been chemically separated from a liquid
precipitate.translation[2].definitions[0: happening or done too quickly, and not thought about carefully
